name: 謝東儒
objective:
本課程是研究所高等計算機圖學之應用延伸課程，著重於電腦動畫之程式設計技術。主題包含物理動畫原理、骨架、關鍵格、逆運動學、動作捕捉系統等。

This course is a graduate-level advanced computer graphics course focusing on the programming techniques in computer animation. Topics include physically based animation, skeletons, key framing, inverse kinematics, and motion capture.
schedule:
physically based animation
skeletons, key framing
inverse kinematics
motion capture
